Footer.description: Connecting independent music artists with clients professionally.

layout.title: Connect Talent. Build Careers. Create Success.
layout.description: Join thousands of professionals who have found their dream opportunities through our platform. Your next career move starts here.

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Log in to your TalentLink account
login.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

signup.title: Create TalentLink account
signup.subtitle: Welcome! Sign up to get started!
signup.displaynameMinLength: Display name must not be empty
signup.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
signup.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

forgotPassword.title: Find your account
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email below to reset your password
forgotPassword.requestSuccess: If the email exists, a reset code has been sent
forgotPassword.emailNotExist: Email does not exist, please sign up first
forgotPassword.emailMissing: Missing email. Please go back and try again.
forgotPassword.otpDescription: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email
forgotPassword.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

verifyEmail.title: Enter verification code
verifyEmail.subtitle: We sent a 6-digit code to your email.
verifyEmail.label: Verification code
verifyEmail.description: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email.
verifyEmail.verifySuccess: Email verified successfully! Login to continue
verifyEmail.resendSuccess: A new verification code has been sent.
verifyEmail.resendError: Could not resend code. Please try again.
verifyEmail.emailMissing: Missing email. Please go back and sign up again.

completeOAuth.title: Complete your account
completeOAuth.subtitle: Choose your role and username to finish signing up with Google.
completeOAuth.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters

hero.title: Discovery
hero.subtitle: Find the best artists and venues for your events

hero.title: Find Music Talent
hero.subtitle: Connect with professional independent artists for your project

features.title: Why Choose TalentLink?
features.subtitle: The most professional and efficient connection platform

diverseGenres.title: Diverse Genres
diverseGenres.description: From pop, rock, EDM to acoustic and classical - everything is here

easyConnection.title: Easy Connection
easyConnection.description: Send collaboration requests directly, no intermediaries needed

cta.title: Are You an Artist?
cta.subtitle: Create a professional profile and access thousands of collaboration opportunities

hero.title: Empowering Independent Artists
hero.subtitle: We are building the bridge between talent and opportunity, making it easier for artists and venues to connect, collaborate, and thrive.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At TalentLink, we believe that every artist deserves a stage and every venue deserves great performances. Our platform eliminates the barriers between talent and opportunity by providing a seamless, transparent, and professional marketplace for the music industry.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

community.title: Community First
community.description: We build with our users, not just for them. Every feature is designed to strengthen the music community.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear pricing, direct communication, and verified profiles. No hidden fees or surprises.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Leveraging technology to solve age-old problems in the gig economy.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.description: Giving control back to the artists and venue owners.

cta.title: Join the Revolution
cta.subtitle: Be part of the platform that is reshaping the live music industry.

JobPool.title: Find Your Next Gig
JobPool.subtitle: Venues looking for talent. Artists looking for stages. Your next performance is here.

emptyState.title: No jobs found
emptyState.description: Try adjusting your filters or search keywords to find what you're looking for.

emptyProducers.title: No jobs for producers found
emptyProducers.description: No jobs looking for producers match your current filters.

emptySingers.title: No jobs for singers found
emptySingers.description: No jobs looking for singers match your current filters.

emptySaved.title: No saved jobs
emptySaved.description: Save jobs you're interested in to view them here later.

MyApplications.title: My Applications
MyApplications.subtitle: Track the status of your applications and see which jobs you've applied to.

error.loadFailed: Unable to load your applications right now.

noApplications.title: No applications yet
noApplications.description: You haven't applied to any jobs yet. Start exploring the job pool!

noPosts.title: No {status} jobs
noPosts.description: You don't have any jobs in this category.

dashboard.title: Dashboard Overview
dashboard.subtitle: Manage featured content displayed on the landing page

stats.usersDescription: Artists and producers displayed on the landing page
stats.jobsDescription: Job opportunities highlighted on the landing page

quickGuide.title: Quick Guide
quickGuide.featuredUsersGuide: Use Featured Users to manage which artists and producers appear on the landing page
quickGuide.featuredJobsGuide: Use Featured Jobs to highlight important job opportunities and gigs
quickGuide.recommendedMax: Recommended maximum: 50 featured users and 50 featured jobs (10 displayed on landing page)

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.description: You need admin privileges to access this page.

featuredUsersPage.title: Featured Users
featuredUsersPage.manageDescription: Manage which users appear on the landing page
featuredUsersPage.unfeatureConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from featured users? They will no longer appear on the landing page.
featuredUsersPage.featureConfirm: Are you sure you want to feature {name}? They will appear on the landing page.

featuredJobsPage.title: Featured Jobs
featuredJobsPage.manageDescription: Manage which job posts appear on the landing page
featuredJobsPage.unfeatureConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove "{title}" from featured jobs? It will no longer appear on the landing page.
featuredJobsPage.featureConfirm: Are you sure you want to feature "{title}"? It will appear on the landing page.

editor.manageSubtitle: Update information to make your venue appear more professional.
editor.manageArtistSubtitle: Update information to keep your profile attractive to clients.
editor.profilePhotosDesc: Profile picture and cover photo will appear on your public profile page.
editor.portfolioMediaDesc: Upload high-quality images and video links to showcase your talent.
editor.photoGalleryDesc: Showcase your venue with high-quality photos.
editor.photoGalleryArtistDesc: Select your best moments to showcase your performance style.
editor.deleteImageDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this image? This action cannot be undone.
editor.experienceServicesDesc: Update your standout projects, skills, and services.
editor.contactDesc: This information helps organizers easily connect with you.
editor.socialMediaDesc: Link your main channels for fans and partners to follow you.
editor.deleteExpDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this experience item? This action cannot be undone.

artist.genresInfo: Add genres to help organizers find you
artist.briefIntroductionPlaceholder: Quick summary of your style and strengths
artist.detailedIntroductionPlaceholder: Tell more about your projects, achievements, or personal brand story.
artist.mainInformationDesc: Share what stands out about you to attract organizers.
artist.videoPortfolioDesc: Add performance videos for organizers to quickly assess your style.
artist.experienceListDesc: These items will appear on your public profile.

venue.contactVenueDesc: Help artists and organizers easily reach out to you.
venue.basicInformationDesc: Set venue name, type, and capacity.
venue.venueDetailsDesc: Provide information about amenities, hours, and pricing.
venue.amenitiesPlaceholder: e.g., Sound System, Stage Lighting, Parking

form.title: Job Details
form.description: Fill in the details below to create your job posting.
form.descriptionMinLength: Description must be at least {min} characters. Current: {current}
form.compensationDescription: Set the budget and payment terms.

placeholders.jobTitle: e.g. Acoustic singer for Friday night residency
placeholders.description: Describe the job in detail, schedule, expectations...
placeholders.location: e.g. Ho Chi Minh City, District 1

messages.loadGenresError: Unable to load genres. Please try again later.
messages.descMinLength: Description must be at least 20 characters.
messages.fillRequired: Please fill in all required fields.

MessagesPage.title: Messages
